article_title: Patients at higher risk for psychiatric symptoms after ICU stay
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Patients are at increased risk for mental symptoms such as post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression following stays in the intensive care unit, according to a study from Johns Hopkins Medicine.
